com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.api

Class LiteLoaderCoreAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.api.LiteLoaderCoreAPI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LiteAPI, MixinConfigProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LiteLoaderCoreAPIClient

    public abstract class LiteLoaderCoreAPI
extends java.lang.Object
implements LiteAPI, MixinConfigProvider
    LiteLoader's API impl.
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompatibilityLevel getCompatibilityLevel()
      Get the minimum required mixin operating compatibility level for this API, can return null.
      java.util.List<EnumeratorModule> getEnumeratorModules()
      Should return a list of Enumerator modules to be injected, can return null if the API doesn't want to inject any additonal modules
      java.lang.String[] getErrorHandlers()
      Get mixin error handler classes to register for this API.
      java.lang.String getIdentifier()
      Get the identifier for this API, the identifier is used to retrieve the API and match it against specified mod API dependencies.
      java.lang.String[] getMixinConfigs()
      Get mixin configuration files for this API, all returned configs will be added to the DEFAULT environment.
      MixinConfigProvider getMixins()
      Get mixin environment configuration provider for this API, can return null.
      java.lang.String getModClassPrefix()
      Return a mod class prefix supported by this API, can return null if an API just wants to use "LiteMod" as a standard class name prefix
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the friendly name of this API
      abstract ObjectFactory<?,?> getObjectFactory()
      Get the ObjectFactory
      int getRevision()
      Get the revision number of this API.
      java.lang.String getVersion()
      Get the human-readable version of the API, can be any value
      void init(LoaderEnvironment environment, LoaderProperties properties)
      Initialise this API, the API should do as little processing as possible here, but should also cache the supplied environment and properties instances for later use.

      • getRevision

        public int getRevision()
        Description copied from interface: LiteAPI
        Get the revision number of this API. Unlike the version number, the revision number should only change when an incompatible change is made to the APIs interfaces, it is also used when a mod specifies an API dependency using the api@revision syntax.
        Specified by:
        getRevision in interface LiteAPI

      • getModClassPrefix

        public java.lang.String getModClassPrefix()
        Description copied from interface: LiteAPI
        Return a mod class prefix supported by this API, can return null if an API just wants to use "LiteMod" as a standard class name prefix
        Specified by:
        getModClassPrefix in interface LiteAPI
